replies.msg:
!!成年人請為自己的投資負責!!
!!冇人知邊隻股票會升，除非佢係神/財演，記住你只係落緊賭注!!

入市前先:

1. 訂立買入點 (有紀律唔好偷步入)
2. 訂立止蝕點 (Program硬性止蝕 或者 心入面要有止蝕位)
3. 保本保本保本 (見好就收，賺少左好過蝕錢。或者減倉鎖定利潤)
4. 做個真男人，錯左就認輸，唔好係同一隻股票上面死纏爛打
5. 有疑惑就離場/減倉，冇人捉住你隻手迫你坐到止蝕/止賺，走左隨時可以入返

有人問點解尋晚咁早訓，係咪財演
我通常限制自己最好11點前平倉，如果12點前都未平倉既話通常都唔係好既徵兆
好大機會係睇緊最後一兩個trade可唔可以拉返平手離場 (保本為上)

一般黎講股市係早盤 930-1000 同尾盤 3:30-4:00 交易量最大
短線交易既話呢兩個時段比較多人玩，因為通常方向比較易睇，調頭既話都會多人接盤，反應快可以唔洗死。

11點後至3點半前Volume較細，股票比較易冇方向行range，或者一D係早盤炒上去既泡沫股會開始冇力free fall (因為主力已出貨)。另外就係某d細股或者中型股唔夠Volume，買賣差價(spread)會變大，增加左你既交易成本。

(非短線交易者可以唔洗理我)

至於係咪財演，屌你啦冇賣課程冇比TIPS冇開TG GROUP，一蚊都冇賺你既財演嗎
巴打 小米今晚得唔得

replies.msg:
未買過美股應該開個美股戶口先
開邊間唔講啦人人唔同可以google
唔好用支牛換美金，佢本身有提供美股孖展，直接買就得（購買力＝等值港幣現金）
一萬蚊都可以分開買唔同股票，美股最低可以買1股。唔好諗賺大錢，先熟習操作。一萬蚊你可以當10萬跟比例配置。
每一次高位都係突破左上一次高位得來，留意新聞同經濟數據，冇咩事唔洗太擔心，但有事果陣反應一定要快，斬倉要狠。

國外劵商冇手續費，daytrade每日賺少少，一個月都餓唔死你既

多謝支持podcast, 最好fol埋ig

如果你一路有賺可以一路慢慢減倉

eg 30股AAPL 升到咁上下就走10股 再升又走10股
淨返10股咪擺係度

或者數口精既，可以去到profit cover到最尾果注既數，咁你減左倉既其實淨低都係profit，點你都係贏

個例子明
但後面有啲複雜

定買住10股有賺先再加？

買住10股先有賺再加 穩陣d 賺少d

後面既意思即係
股票A 買左15000蚊 > 升到去20000蚊
即 PROFIT = 5000
呢個時候你減倉15000
淨返5000蚊做倉底，但其實全部都係PROFIT, 就算你輸哂都係冇蝕
咁咪可以坐定定睇佢慢慢舞

CVX/MUR (Gulf of Mexico oil producers like Chevron and Murphy Oil have evacuated offshore facilities ahead of the anticipated arrival of tropical storm Sally, which is forecast to strengthen into a hurricane.)

PEP (A new wellness product from PepsiCo, called Driftwell, is aimed at improving sleep quality. The enhanced water drink will contain L-theanine, an amino acid that is also found in green and black teas and some mushrooms, will be distributed in grocery stores by early 2021.)

ATHM (Autohome (NYSE:ATHM) plans a second listing that could raise about $1B.Autohome is reportedly working with advisers on the Hong Kong listing, which could happen as soon as early 2021.)

quote.msg: 點解星期五係四巫日? 有咩 meaning

四巫日（英語：Quadruple witching day）是指美國市場於季月（三月、六月、九月、十二月）第三個星期五之衍生性金融商品到期結算日，預期中商品價格會有較大的波動。當日最後交易小時稱為四巫小時（英語：Quadruple witching hour），為紐約時間下午三時至四時。

from wiki

尋日FED凌晨2點宣佈左唔加息(interest rates could stay anchored to the zero-bound through 2023)，指數即刻升，但去到3點就大插到收市。大家自己interpret下呢個market reaction，唔好問我我都唔知，未得閑諗

航空股請注意:
Several airline executives are planning to meet White House officials today with only two weeks to go before a ban on industry job cuts is set to expire. Airline CEOs and labor unions want another $25B in federal aid to preserve sector jobs through the end of next March as a recovery in travel demand hasn't yet materialized.

石油in action: (疲弱左好耐)
The energy alliance agreed in July to cut production by 7.7M barrels per day from August through to December, while Iraq and others pledged to pump below their quotas in September to offset overproduction earlier in the year. Already this week, OPEC and the IEA, two prominent forecasters, trimmed their 2020 outlook for crude demand, while oil major BP (NYSE:BP) warned that demand may have peaked in 2019.

https://www.instagram.com/invest.no.bullshit/

4巫日:
Quad witching day, which refers to the simultaneous expiration of market index futures, stock futures, market index options and stock options. "These days tend to get a lot of press for all of the volume they create, but historically they are nearly always a non-event, said Ryan Detrick, senior market strategist at LPL Financial.


ORCL (TikTok owner ByteDance (BDNCE) agreed to list the video-sharing app on a U.S. stock exchange, which could happen within a year, though there are still concerns over whether the Chinese parent would be allowed to retain a majority stake in the new company.)

BX/TRI (the London Stock Exchange is in exclusive talks to sell Borsa Italiana to France's Euronext . Offloading the Milan stock exchange would help LSE achieve regulatory remedies for its $27B purchase of data provider Refinitiv, which is owned by Blackstone (NYSE:BX) and Thomson Reuters (NYSE:TRI))

歐洲仲武肺緊:
Targeted lockdowns and local restrictions are returning to Europe as the region tries to avoid broad economic damage amid a surge in coronavirus cases. "Weekly cases have now exceeded those reported when the pandemic first peaked in Europe in March," Targeted lockdowns and local restrictions are returning to Europe as the region tries to avoid broad economic damage amid a surge in coronavirus cases. "Weekly cases have now exceeded those reported when the pandemic first peaked in Europe in March,"

BA ( Proposed Boeing (NYSE:BA) 737 MAX safety upgrades endorsed by NTSB.)

AZN (AstraZeneca's Imfinzi extends survival in lung cancer patients)

FB (跌左好撚耐，可以留意下會唔會超跌反彈)

4巫日:
Quad witching day, which refers to the simultaneous expiration of market index futures, stock futures, market index options and stock options. "These days tend to get a lot of press for all of the volume they create, but historically they are nearly always a non-event, said Ryan Detrick, senior market strategist at LPL Financial.


ORCL (TikTok owner ByteDance (BDNCE) agreed to list the video-sharing app on a U.S. stock exchange, which could happen within a year, though there are still concerns over whether the Chinese parent would be allowed to retain a majority stake in the new company.)

BX/TRI (the London Stock Exchange is in exclusive talks to sell Borsa Italiana to France's Euronext . Offloading the Milan stock exchange would help LSE achieve regulatory remedies for its $27B purchase of data provider Refinitiv, which is owned by Blackstone (NYSE:BX) and Thomson Reuters (NYSE:TRI))
